A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I simply do not understand the hate with this movie. In my opinion\, Rian Johnson made a beautiful film with multiple themes that makes the audience think deeply\, which is such a huge positive for me personally. Along with some of the best star wars action scenes in the history of Star Wars\, this movie dives deep into many characters and challenges them all in such a great way! Way to go Rian Johnson!
